author.name: Licensed by Woolworths  ©️ Dorling Kindersley Ltd

description: This simple soup is prepared with a ready-made broth in Spain - leftovers from one of the bean soups popular at midday, flavoured with diced Serrano ham and parsley, and with hard-boiled egg.
name: 15minute Soup Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1L chicken broth, hot (for the glutenfree option, use gluten-free stock)

recipeInstructions.text: In a large pan, bring the broth, rice, and ham to the boil. Reduce the heat and simmer for 15 minutes, or until the rice is nearly tender.
Add the eggs and simmer for a further 1 minute. Remove from the heat, then stir in the parsley and mint, if using. Serve piping hot.
